text:
Community Housing Providers National Law (Tasmania)

The Community Housing Providers National Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Appendix to the Community Housing Providers (Adoption of National Law) Act 2012 of New South Wales is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Community Housing Providers National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the Community Housing Providers National Law (Tasmania)

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the Community Housing Providers National Law were applied as a law of Tasmania on 1 January 2014.

2. Further information
    The full text of the Community Housing Providers National Law is set out in the Appendix to the Community Housing Providers (Adoption of National Law) Act 2012 of New South Wales (click on INFORMATION for a link to New South Wales legislation). See the Community Housing Providers National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 for modifications to the Community Housing Providers National Law as it applies in Tasmania.
